headline.main: For His Day, A Good Cigar

docs.abstract: Article on cigar smoking in US; some Manhattan cigar stores listed; illus (M)

keywords.value: TOBACCO, TOBACCO PRODUCTS AND SMOKERS ARTICLES
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: MIAMI Like the 5-cent hot dog and the $10,000 home, the good 5-cent cigar envisaged more than half a century ago by Vice President Thomas R. Marshall is an element of the American Dream that has vanished on the winds of inflation like a puff of smoke.
